thread.title: Company Headquarters Are Able To Pay Employees All Over The US With Latest EzPaycheck Payroll Software
thread.title_full: Company Headquarters Are Able To Pay Employees All Over The US With Latest EzPaycheck Payroll Software

author: PRWEB
title: Company Headquarters Are Able To Pay Employees All Over The US With Latest EzPaycheck Payroll Software
text:
ezPaycheck offers companies the flexibility to process payroll from one state when employees are working for them all over the US. Atlantic City, NJ (PRWEB) July 10, 2015
Many companies have one main office and employees working for them throughout the US. With this in mind, Halfpricesoft.com offers ezPaycheck payroll software to easily and less expensively pay team members with one application, no matter where in the United States the employee is living or working. By simply adding the employee's home address in the software setup, taxes and deductions for that specific area will automatically be calculated. Network versions are also available if more than one office is handling payroll processing.
“ezPaycheck offers companies the flexibility to process payroll from one state when employees are working for them all over the U.S.” said Dr. Ge, the founder of halfpricesoft.com.
EzPaycheck software is designed to automate paycheck processes to reduce the time spent on running payroll. The software’s graphical interface leads users step-by-step through setting up employee information, importing data, calculating payroll - including calculation of federal, state and local taxes; deductions for Medicare, insurance and 401(k) plans; and printing paychecks. New user can download and try this software for free with no obligation and no cost at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/payroll_software_download.asp
EzPaycheck payroll software includes the latest tax tables and tax forms. This paycheck software also supports flexible tax options to satisfy the special businesses, nonprofits, and churches.
Small businesses and nonprofits will appreciate the unique features in the latest release of ezPaycheck payroll software:
Supports daily, weekly, biweekly, semimonthly and monthly payroll periods. Features report functions, printing functions and pay stub functions. Easily calculates differential pay
Prints miscellaneous checks as well as payroll calculation checks.
Prints payroll checks on blank computer checks or preprinted checks.
Automatically calculates Federal Withholding Tax, Social Security, Medicare Tax and Employer Unemployment Taxes.
-Includes built-in tax tables for all 50 states and the District of Columbia.
Creates and maintains payrolls for multiple companies, and does it simultaneously. Prints Tax Forms 940, 941, W-2 and W-3.
-Supports multiple accounts at no additional charge.
-Supports network access.
Priced at $89 per calendar year, ezPaycheck payroll software is affordable for any size business owner.
Customers seeking a way to simplify payroll processing with more accuracy to start the no obligation 30-day test drive today at: http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp
About Halfpricesoft.com
Founded in 2003, Halfpricesoft.com has established itself as a leader in meeting and exceeding the software requirements of small businesses around the world. Offering payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, check writing/printing software, W2 software, 1099 software and ezACH deposit software. It continues to grow in the philosophy that small business owners deserve affordable, user-friendly, and totally risk-free software.
